## SenderResource.getAll() method

Retrieves a list of the users in an account. Optional query parameters can be used to filter the list. By default, only one sender is retrieved. To retrieve additional users you must modify the “to” and “from” parameters, where each number in the parameter corresponds to a user. For example: to = 3 from = 10 will return users 3 to 10 in the user list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAll(params?: Requests.GetAllSendersParameters): Promise<Responses.BulkGetResponse<Sender>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | Requests.GetAllSendersParameters | Additional parameters for the query |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Responses.BulkGetResponse&lt;[Sender](./onespan-sign-node.sender.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

A payload that contains the result count and an array of the matched senders.
